    Get the View changes, create the Action following the state and send it to the Remote Controller
    void notifyResponse()
    If the response is related to the user: - 1)If the response is an Ack, ControllerClient will set his ControllerState, will set View Command and will run it - 2)If the response is a Nack, ControllerClient will set the Command to the View and will run View after Error Message Printing

    Call to the View the method to update or print the Board

      public void setClient​(Client client)
      Client Setter
      Parameters:
      client - is the client that will be set to ControllerClient

    • notifyControllerAction

      public void notifyControllerAction()
      Get the View changes, create the Action following the state and send it to the Remote Controller

    • notifyResponse

      public void notifyResponse()
      If the response is related to the user: - 1)If the response is an Ack, ControllerClient will set his ControllerState, will set View Command and will run it - 2)If the response is a Nack, ControllerClient will set the Command to the View and will run View after Error Message Printing

    • printView

      public void printView()
      Call to the View the method to update or print the Board

    • viewRunner

      public void viewRunner()
      Execute the view phase

      public void send​(Action action)
      Send to the Client the action created
      Parameters:
      action - is the action that will be sent into the server
